title: Switching $$x$$ and $$y$$
text: We must now substitute all instances for $$x$$ by $$y$$ and instances of $$y$$ by $$x$$. $$x=\frac{3}{y-4}$$
speech: We must now substitute all instances for  x  by  y  and instances of  y  by  x .  x is equal to, fraction, 3 over, y minus 4,

title: Solving for $$y$$
text: Now, we must manipulate the equation and solve for $$y$$. $$y=\frac{3}{x}+4$$
speech: Now, we must manipulate the equation and solve for  y .  y, is equal to, 3 over x, plus 4
